name: Cannot Guarantee Xmas Delivery
description: As of 12/19 I cannot guarantee plaque deliveries in time for Christmas. Cobalt quartz wands which are kept in stock can be guaranteed. I am a 60 year old one man band doing all of this work. I can still do a lot in a hurry, but as of today the backlog in orders is just too large. My apologies for any inconvenience this may be causing you for Christmas.

name: Opening
description:

"The roots of a lotus are in the mud, the stem grows up through the water, and the heavily scented flower lies pristinely above the water, basking in the sunlight. This pattern of growth signifies the progress of the soul from the primeval mud of materialism, through the waters of experience, and into the bright sunshine of enlightenment."

Everyone knows gnomes are lucky, and that big gnomes are even luckier. This old boy sports stars on his cap - the insignia of the sorcerer and wizard. His penetrating stare and smiling cheeks are guaranteed to repel evil or mischievous spirits.
Cast from a large and rare tinned chocolate mold.

No home should be gnomeless. No gnome should be homeless.

name: "Copper Top" Wide Spectrum Field Pucks
description:
(*Christmas Season Special - For every 5 copper tops one free puck will be added to the order. Ordering 5 pucks will get you 6. Ordering 10 pucks will get you 12, ad infinitum. The smallest USPS flat rate priority mailer will hold 6 pucks exactly.
The free pucks will not be listed on the checkout invoice but will be noted on the emailed update and invoice that I send everyone within a day or two of receiving orders.)
 
"Copper Tops" - For Repairing the Mental and Physical Effects of Electropollution

Strong sources of electromagnetic radiation stimulate orgonia to emit a sweet and coherent vibration that many people find calming and centering. Electrosensitive people especially call this material a “life saver” - it rescues them from the electromagnetic distress that creates psychological confusion, impaired biological processes, insomnia and lots of other malfunctions. With the proliferation of cell phone towers, "smart" meters," and wireless routers we are all electrosensitive now. 
The mechanism by which this stuff works is still mysterious, but the main theory is that the metal shavings absorb and then reflect aetheric forces whereas the organic resin binder only absorbs. The two conflicting forces “scramble” the incoming electromagnetic energies which are then made coherent again by the quartz crystals inside. The quartz is under pressure from the cured, shrunken resin which somehow boosts the energy output.  The end result is an energy that entrains the body and mind in a delightful manner—the exact opposite of the entrainment imposed by electromagnetic pollution. My pucks use both copper and aluminum - just like the wall plaques - to gather and transform as wide a spectrum of offending energies as possible. The dense pure copper layer combined with the lighter aluminum layer processes a wide spectrum of offending radiations. The pucks also include several lithium bearing minerals like petalite which add the calming and relaxing effect that so many people report (see Customer Testimonials.) I also use only clear gemmy grades of quartz points in all of my work. I feel this contributes to greater force and clarity of energy.

It is not necessary to understand or believe in orgone theory to get its benefits—experience will tell you all you need to know. Placing these around or throughout a dwelling suffuses the environment with an upbeat, positive, calm, and centered feeling. Paradoxically, the nastier the level of electropollution the stronger is the energy output from the orgonite. Just carrying one in a pocket or keeping it at bedside can completely transform your being. I never cease to be amazed by orgonite.
For a more thorough look at this material please read the web site's various headings. The plaques are suited to saturating a home or business's structural components with orgone energy - they are more subtle but deeper. Ideally, both types of orgonia can be used. The "copper tops" are a great introduction.

*Orgonia does not interfere with cell phone signals or any such transmission.

(Photos #3 and #4 show one of my puck displays at the "Dark Star Visuals" bead and clothing store in Fayetteville, Arkansas.)

name: Orgonia Pendant
description:
1 1/2 inch diameter orgonia pendant. (Chain length customizable for no extra charge.)

These are basically smaller versions of the copper top pucks mounted in an antiqued brass bezel. The lensing effect is achieved by first pouring a layer of clear resin behind which is layered the copper shavings. Tiny quartz crystals are tucked into the resin bound shavings along with the additives such as scolecite crystals from Narsik, India (see fourth photo.) Scolecite is sublimely relaxing and calming and is also both piezoelectric and pyroelectric meaning that within the matrix or orgonia it responds both to vibration and thermal shifts. Lying against your chest it responds to vibration when you speak, and it responds and is energized by the heat of your body as well.

 I can make any length chain you desire. All of the jewelry work is done by me. I can also work with whatever custom chain you might want to use. That can be negotiated by email.

These have a wonderful, relaxing energy that can ride around with you all day long and look good doing it. The finely chopped recycled pure copper wire has a intricate and elegant looking texture underneath the clear resin lens.

From "The Book Of Stones."
"The phrase that best summarizes the energy of scolecite is "inner peace." These stones in both tumbled and crystal form emanate a deep peace that can resonate through one's entire auric field. For those who wish to enhance meditation, sleep more restfully, or dream more sweetly, scolecite is highly recommended.
Emotionally, scolecite enhances the heart chakra energies making the spontaneous expression of love a more frequent experience. It is a good stone to exchange between lovers, helping to establish a constant invisible connection between their hearts."

name: Orbicular Sea Turtle
description:
Orgone field emitting plaque. 4 3/4 x 4 3/4 inches

In Japanese folk iconography the sea turtle symbolizes wisdom, deliberation, and long life. The trailing stylized skirt represents water falling off of the turtle's back as it surfaces for air, or it depicts a trail of algae that has accumulated from many years of roaming the sea.
This is a somewhat more modern treatment of the subject.

name: Cobalt Quartz Faceted Wand (Back In Stock)
description:
6 inches long. 1.4 inches diameter tapering to 1.1 inch diameter - 30 facets.

The metal cobalt gives this quartz its lovely dark blue sapphire color. This is not a surface coloration but a part of the molecular structure of the quartz which is man made in high tech pressure vessels that reproduce the natural conditions which make quartz deep in the earth.  In a gem grading sense this is "flawless" quartz that has no cracks, fissures, or inclusions, and when crafted into these expertly faceted energy tools the material is a pure conduit for whatever energy is put into it. 
I own a nice collection of precision faceted quartz wands in natural grown quartz, but since discovering these cobalt wands last Spring they have become the wands I most reach for. They are centering, relaxing, and more than any other crystal they are healing. Energy workers are always talking about "healing," but these wands really do heal - they walk the walk. One of my favorite stones is dark blue sapphire - there is a long, long ayurvedic tradition of using blue sapphire to settle and cohere the aura - these big wands are like giant gem grade sapphires such as are never seen in nature. I find these wands endlessly delightful, and love holding them up to a light source and looking through their heavenly blueness. It is a very potent color therapy. 

Just idly fiddling around with these in your hands and gazing into them feels very, very nice. After working with a lot of different sizes and shapes (and locating a careful and reliable cutter) I finally settled on this design and have these custom cut to my specifications which include having one end gently rounded so that it nestles in the palm of the hand without poking the skin with sharp facets. The energy of the hand is absorbed by the spherical end, accelerated and focused by the precise faceting, and then goes rocketing out of the pointed end. You can wave the crystal back and forth past the fingers of your free hand and feel a vibration like dragging a stick down a picket fence. 

There is an elaborate lore surrounding the use of faceted quartz wands, but if you are a novice you can just mess around with this tool and come up with your own mojo. Just holding one and meditating is good enough for most everyone. The energy is as accessible as that of orgonia and makes a very nice adjunct to orgonia energy.

The clear lateral line down the middle of the quartz is the "seed plate" upon which slowly nucleates the hot, high pressure quartz fluid inside the reactor vessel. There is a faint mist of tiny star looking things just off the surface of the seed plate that look sort of like a galaxy. When I first saw one of these wands I wondered if the seed line would interrupt the energy, but the instant I picked one up in my hands and felt how strong it was it was obvious that the seed line may actually be enhancing the energy by some sort of edge effect or something like that. The clear seed plate is itself a piece of quartz also, so the entire tool is quartz.

These come with a soft but durable silicone rubber storage pouch that snaps easily but snugly shut like a purse and protects the wand in a manner befitting its quality. The drawstring inner pouch is made of microfiber lens polishing cloth which can be used to buff and clean the wand too without scratching the mirror polished surface.
These are beautifully and precisely cut heirloom grade quartz wands - very fairly priced. I order these in groups of 5, and it takes about 3 weeks to replenish stock; so be forewarned if you want one of these for Christmas.

***************************

From "The Book Of Stones"
"These stones have been laboratory grown specifically for their greatly refined flawless nature and vibrant color. Cultured quartz is actually a purer form of quartz having no inclusions and a more stable pattern of rotation in the molecules which speeds up the energy movement in the crystal.
The cobalt blue ray has an amazing blend of serenity, purity, and beauty. It is related to the throat and brow chakras which embody the qualities of inner vision, clairvoyance, intuition, communication and detachment. It reduces tension and brings calm to the body by quieting the mind, giving detachment from one's lower emotions."

Note: The Orgonia store is set up not to oversell items that are temporarily out of stock, so if the stock is depleted there will be no sale allowed. However, when stocks begin to run low more of that item will be ordered. There is limited stock on only a few items - some necklaces and these cobalt quartz wands.

Note: These wands are not about moderating EMF's, but they can be helpful in repairing an aura damaged by electropollution.

A shape to resonate with the brain's pineal gland - the seat of the soul.  Bertrandite crystals are used an an additive to further stimulate the brain and tweak the various brain glands. True crystals of bertrandite are not "tiffany stone" as is generally thought. Bertrandite has a more intense expression of beryllium energy than tiffany stone which is the "massive" less crystalized form of bertrandite. Compared to the other beryl powerhouses like tugtupite, phenacite, and herderite bertrandite is a less knock you upside the head crystal. It's one of my favorites. When the head needs adjustment I carry a crystal of it in a pouch around my neck.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bertrandite

name: Br'er Rabbit
description:
Cast from an old chocolate Easter egg mold this orgonia desk or pocket piece evokes fairy tale associations. I keep one of these on my work desk and stare into it at idle moments when a little daydreaming is in order. Years of contemplative probing with a lingering thumb will polish the little rabbit and the dreamy landscape to a subtle glow. The dynamics of shrinkage on this piece nearly always leave pockmarked ends, but that looks rather cool - like the air pockets in old fashioned copper casting.
Children are especially attracted to these, and I have given some of these away to kids especially if they appear to be going through a tough time developmentally or whatever.

2 1/2 x 1 3/4 x 5/8 inches

name: St. Anthony
description:
Orgone field emitting plaque. 6 1/4 x 6 3/4

"St. Anthony is the patron and protector of animals, on account of his intense regard for the brute creation during his lifetime. He is inseparably associated in Christian Art with a pig; not because he was ever a swineherd, nor, as Fuller observes, since by living in a cave, and feeding upon roots, he and the hogs had something in common; but rather for the reason that the hog is typical of the demon of gluttony and sensuality, which St. Anthony is supposed to have vanquished by the exercise of piety and the Divine assistance. As the founder of monachism, he wears a monk's habit and cowl. The crutch upon which he leans is given to him out of respect for his age; while the bell suspended from the crutch, or carried in his hand, indicates his power to exorcise evil spirits because he withstood so many demons and temptations. (Died 356.)"

name: Angelite Necklace
description:
Hand knotted Peruvian Angelite necklace - 6mm bead diameter - 26 inch length.

Angelite is one of the most exquisitely relaxing stones on earth. The material coming from Peru now is of superb quality. This is the kind of necklace that can be used to wind down at the end of a hectic day, and it will wash over you about as quickly as a beer or glass of wine as soon as you put it around your neck. This is also an excellent aid to meditation. If I had only one stone to take with me to the proverbial desert island angelite would be high on my list.

The Book Of Stones on angelite:
"The frequency of angelite is soothing to the emotional body lending a lightness of being during difficult times. It is a stone of tranquility and  it evokes a sense of inner peace when it is worn or used in meditation. It can be utilized to help bring peace to situations where conflict or ego posturing is making progress difficult. As its name implies angelite is useful in connecting with the guidance of angels and spiritually aligned beings.
Angelite's mineral composition is related to the skeletal system, particularly in regard to energetic support of one's bone density and growth as well as such issues as arthritis and osteoporosis. It energetically assists one in attaining greater mobility and range of motion and helps dissolve calcification in the joints."  

I have been making hand knotted necklaces for a few years. Purist jewelers serious about stone energies tend to use knotted necklaces to minimize the antenna influence of metal wires though the differences may be subtle. Supple, knotted necklaces also drape wonderfully on the body, and if a necklace breaks the beads don't go bouncing off every which way. Knots also separate the beads and keep them from wearing against each other. The Griffin "High Performance" beading thread that appeared on the market recently has revolutionized knotted necklace making. This material is 15 times stronger than steel for a given thread diameter and certainly stronger than silk or nylon which had a reputation for fraying and breaking with heavy wear. 
Continuous knotted necklaces are beautifully simple and strong with no clasps to fiddle with, and the spaced beads of high grade are each highlighted and accentuated by the arrangement.

Note: These necklaces are not about moderating EMF's, but they can be helpful in repairing an aura damaged by electropollution.

name: White Coral Necklace
description:
White coral hand knotted bead necklace - 5.5mm bead diameter - 26 inches length.

I have a special fondness for white coral. It has it's own soothing qualities with complex undertones. Something is happening deep inside with this material, yet the pace is slow and measured. It's like having a very congenial friend who nevertheless gently urges that you pay attention to your fears and hangups - all those things that get in the way of complete peace and self possession - all of those "loose ends." This is a good stone to have near you when you are in threatening situations or just situations that usually make you uneasy for whatever reason. There is a sense that you are part of a larger whole that makes your petty little bothers seem superfluous.
This coral comes from reefs managed for jewelry harvesting - not "wild" reefs.

From "Gems Of the 7 Color Rays" - "By wearing white coral we will learn to maintain an inner feeling of safety and security even in circumstances that might have frightened us at one time.
Negative emotions of others can be quite destructive to our energy flow, especially during the process of rebuilding our core. White coral may help us become aware of the source of this negativity and its effects. This awareness will go a long way toward keeping us out of the line of fire."

"Understand that you are much like a space colony.Your organs and bodily systems have likely lost touch with each other. They obtain directives, but are used to being ignored when their needs change. Problems have developed in your body.
When you begin to wear coral it is like bringing in information from an undersea colony. The coral is dead, but the vibrations of the creatures are still within its makeup. This hologram is complete in even the smallest beads. The rounded beads allow the vibrations of coral to emanate in all directions. Your body gets the message. Every part gets the same message - a restructuring can begin. A new language of cooperation is developed."

I have been making hand knotted necklaces for a few years. Purist jewelers serious about stone energies tend to use knotted necklaces to minimize the antenna influence of metal wires though the differences may be subtle. Supple, knotted necklaces also drape wonderfully on the body, and if a necklace breaks the beads don't go bouncing off every which way. Knots also separate the beads and keep them from wearing against each other. The Griffin "High Performance" beading thread that appeared on the market recently has revolutionized knotted necklace making. This material is 15 times stronger than steel for a given thread diameter and certainly stronger than silk or nylon which had a reputation for fraying and breaking with heavy wear. 
Continuous knotted necklaces are beautifully simple and strong with no clasps to fiddle with, and the spaced beads of high grade are each highlighted and accentuated by the arrangement.

Note: These necklaces are not about moderating EMF's, but they can be helpful in repairing an aura damaged by electropollution.

name: Blue Lace Agate
description:
Therapeutic grade blue lace agate hand knotted beads - 6mm bead diameter - 26 inches length.

This is the translucent grade of blue lace agate which works on the psychological/mental body. This stone is sort of confidence building and works on the throat chakra making you want to communicate and enunciate ideas. It brings on a state of relaxed vigilance and composure. "The Book of Stones" calls it "the stone of the diplomat."
  
The book "Gems of the 7 Color Rays" has a lot to say about blue lace agate. For instance: "Those who study communication with other mammals or interplanetary communication may find subtle changes in their ideas regarding the nature of thought and thought transference. Can we communicate with a dolphin? Can we understand how an eagle thinks? Wear a strand and try it."

"Blue lace agate is useful in experimentation procedures because it will show one how to uncover causes outside the known or accepted standard... The blue ray encourages new thinking while the vibration of blue lace agate is conducive to taking logical leaps where intuition leads the logical mind. Discrimination will be enhanced."

I have been making hand knotted necklaces for a few years. Purist jewelers serious about stone energies tend to use knotted necklaces to minimize the antenna influence of metal wires though the differences may be subtle. Supple, knotted necklaces also drape wonderfully on the body, and if a necklace breaks the beads don't go bouncing off every which way. Knots also separate the beads and keep them from wearing against each other. The Griffin "High Performance" beading thread that appeared on the market recently has revolutionized knotted necklace making. This material is 15 times stronger than steel for a given thread diameter and certainly stronger than silk or nylon which had a reputation for fraying and breaking with heavy wear. 
Continuous knotted necklaces are beautifully simple and strong with no clasps to fiddle with, and the spaced beads of high grade are each highlighted and accentuated by the arrangement.

Note: These necklaces are not about moderating EMF's, but they can be helpful in repairing an aura damaged by electropollution.

name: White Light Necklace - 6mm
description:
Matte finish therapeutic grade quartz beads - 6mm bead diameter - 26 inches length.

These are at least A grade true quartz beads - not glass. Some manufacturers use lesser grades of quartz for these beads thinking that the frosting will hide imperfections, and some even use glass which is worthless as an energy tool. Only clear  true quartz crystal is safe to use even in a frosted bead. The matte finish puts a governor on the quartz energy which can be jarring in the purely transparent finish. A lot of people I know prefer these matte beads for quartz because the energy level feels more manageable and agreeable, yet the so called "life force" of pure quartz is still present - just not as insistent and overbearing. This a workhorse necklace that can be worn all day and which will endure strenuous activity and even swimming. True crystal quartz is the foundation of energetic stone work and is perhaps the single most versatile stone - it can be "programmed" to accomplish various tasks and objectives.

 "Gems of the 7 Color Rays" on frosted quartz:
 "Frosted quartz will work on one area at a time and allow us to regain our balance before going to the next area. This is a much easier way than the all-at-once scatter gun approach of clear quartz.
For anyone who is easily intimidated, frosted quartz can be a trusted friend who will teach them how to deal with aggression and fear. Wear it continuously for several months while learning its lessons. Women may find its gentle action more supportive than other stones in situations where self protection is a concern."

name: Blue Sky Necklace
description:
Hand knotted - 26 inches long.

White coral and Peruvian angelite combine to create a soothing and supportive energy. Therapeutic grade stones must be clean and uniform with no inclusions or fractures.  These are wonderful beads with uniform density, translucence, and luster.

From "Gems Of the 7 Color Rays" - "By wearing white coral we will learn to maintain an inner feeling of safety and security even in circumstances that might have frightened us at one time.
Negative emotions of others can be quite destructive to our energy flow, especially during the process of rebuilding our core. White coral may help us become aware of the source of this negativity and its effects. This awareness will go a long way toward keeping us out of the line of fire."

From "The Book of Stones" - "The frequency of angelite is soothing to the emotional body lending a lightness of being during difficult times. It is a stone of tranquility and  it evokes a sense of inner peace when it is worn or used in meditation. It can be utilized to help bring peace to situations where conflict or ego posturing is making progress difficult.... As its name implies angelite is useful in connecting with the guidance of angels and spiritually aligned beings."

name: Lilac Lepidolite - 8mm beads
description:
High grade Lilac Lepidolite - 8mm bead diameter - 26 inch length

These beads are from the Madagascar find a few years ago and are of superlative uniformity, density, and luster. The quality of the stone means that the energy absorbed and then reflected back at you will be coherent and smooth without any harshness or disharmony. Like most of the lithium containing stones they are relaxing and soothing. The 26 inch length makes them easy to fit over the head.

“The Book Of Stones” say about Lilac lepidolite:
“The deeply relaxing energies of lepidolite take a wonderful turn in this lilac-colored variety. Its vibration is immediately soothing, facilitating the release of stress, tension, and worries. Its energy is like a deep, warm bath for the aura – cleansing away the emotional and psychic debris of the day and balancing the emotional body.
In addition to its stress releasing properties Lilac Lepidolite is a heart-healing stone. Its soothing, supportive energies are excellent for those who are grieving after a loss, or for those who have experienced some other sort of emotional trauma. Lilac Lepidolite is especially good at soothing and supporting the emotional bodies of children and pets.”

name: Malachite
description:
High grade malachite hand knotted necklace - 7mm bead diameter - 26 inch length.

Therapeutic grade malachite necklaces should have predominantly thin striations oriented perpendicular to the stringing cord. This sets up a vibration that hums around and around the necklace and interacts with your own body's frequency. Malachite is energizing without being "caffeinated," and its steady vibration tends to spotlight sluggish areas of the aura and gradually tone them up via sympathetic vibration. It is like a beacon for the body to follow and emulate. Green stones tend to concentrate on the heart chakra.

About malachite "The Book of Stones" says, "Malachite emanates the healthiest energy pattern for the heart. It benefits both the emotional heart and the pump itself through its harmonization of the heart chakra. Its assists one in maintaining emotional balance, in which one remains in a positive, benevolent state but is not tempted to take on the emotional baggage of others."

About malachite the book "Gems of the 7 Color Rays" says, "For those who truly seek the earth the heavens shall reveal themselves. No other stone can help one to attune to the earth's energies and unlock the mysteries of the earth and its vast array of knowledge in the same way as malachite. It brings understanding of the hidden mysteries of the earth. Yes, the earth has memories and intelligence, and malachite will introduce you to earth's unusual language. It will take you into the mysteries of vibrational signatures and teach you of numbers and symbols."
